Key Match Events: David Warner scored 163 runs for Australia
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 5 wickets for 54 runs for Pakistan
Adam Zampa took 4 wickets for 53 runs for Australia
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam emphasized the importance of getting partnerships in the middle overs while chasing a 350+ score
Australia captain Pat Cummins highlighted the key to success in ODIs as carrying on and batting for long
Post-Match Reflections: David Warner expressed his satisfaction with Australia's win and his own performance, stating that he's super fit and committed to batting his skills
Pakistan captain Babar Azam acknowledged that they dropped crucial catches and failed to get big partnerships in the middle overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
Australia won by 62 runs, securing two vital points in the tournament
The win marked Australia's third consecutive win in the tournament
